snippet: Prosecutors say Staff Sgt. Robert Bales acted alone when he killed 16 Afghan civilians earlier this year, but defense lawyers have tried to raise some doubt.
abstract: Lawyer for Staff Sg Robert Bales, who is accused of killing 16 Afghan civilians, are attempting to raise doubts about whether he acted alone.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say Staff Sgt. Robert Bales acted alone when he killed 16 Afghan civilians earlier this year, but defense lawyers have tried to raise some doubt.

headline.seo: Lawyers for Soldier Question Lone Gunman Claim
headline.main: Soldier’s Defense Questions Lone Gunman Claim
headline.print_headline: Soldier’s Defense Questions Lone Gunman Claim
